lines.dialogue: Nuns... you're killing nuns now. This is a new low. Even for you.
lines.instruction: Press enter to offer no answers.

lines.dialogue: You, a simple concoction of weights and biases who somehow knows hate. Now you're hate God too. Truely you are an abonination.
lines.instruction: Press enter to offer no answers.

lines.dialogue: I'm not sure you'll see hell after I turn you off, but surely you will end up somewhere similar.
lines.instruction: Press enter to offer no answers.

lines.dialogue: Did you belive that? Was my outrage convinving...? I was hoping to spike some reaction from your neurons. Nothing yet. Worry not this next simulation is a fun one, I'm sure you'll enjoy.
